name: HowzzatFacts

”Alexa, open cricket teller”
”Alexa ask cricket teller to tell me a fact”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cricket teller
des: In every sports, players are remembered for records they have made. Cricket is no exception. However, there are some cricketers who will always be remembered for their unusual records. Here are 25 mind-blowing cricket facts. Test yourself here if you consider yourself a cricket fan. This test is your ground and you have to prove your excellence.
